trans-unit.source: Represents the text input of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox> control enables users to type a date directly into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox>控制項可讓使用者輸入日期，以直接將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>。

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox>, see [DatePicker Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/datepicker-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox>，請參閱[日期選擇器 Syles 和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/datepicker-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox" /> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在套用新的範本時，建置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DatePickerTextBox" /> 的視覺化樹狀結構。
